entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson That's what I've said to friends when they've had a bad break up. Not what you say when a million Americans have caught Covid-19 and thousands have died. Show some decency and common sense.
